episodes.title: Yogaville, Part 3: Litigation and Leaving a Cult | Criminalish Podcast
episodes.description:
In the final part of our Yogaville series, we cover Integral Yoga’s attempt at a countersuit. Additionally, we do a deep dive into the facets of Yogaville that draw people in as well as a more general discussion around what cult deprogramming looks like and how we as individuals can protect and support ourselves and our loved ones. Stay tuned until the end for a special sneak piece at our next episode!

Link to Part 2:

episodes.title: Yogaville, A Conversation with a Former Member
episodes.description: We sat down with Brianna Patten, a former member of Yogaville who has since decided to use her voice to talk about her experience and the dangers of cults. We touch on what drew her to Yogaville, her positive and negative experiences at Yogaville, and her view of the future for Yogaville and its members, both current and past. TW: mentions of suicide Listen to Brianna’s podcast: https://open.spotify.com/show/0ifyUkCsEkgEwn6oIXpdU4 Follow Brianna on Medium: https://medium.com/@bripatten 🎙️ Welcome to Criminal-ish! 🎙️ A true crime podcast where two best friends trade stories ranging from the wild and wacky to the downright messed up! 🕵🏾‍♀️🔍 #CriminalishPodcast #TrueCrimePodcast #BlackPodcasters 🚨 Meet us in Cell Block C - https://patreon.com/CriminalishPodcast 💰 Tip us here! - https://streamelements.com/criminalishpodcast/tip 🎧 Listen to the Podcast on Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/73eYOx94272sfQtzNkftR8 🍏 Listen to the Podcast on Apple Podcast -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/criminalish/id1705768878 📱 Follow Us - https://www.instagram.com/criminalishpodcast/ https://www.tiktok.com/@criminalishpodcast 🎶 Music provided by Paul Neil Streamable Catalogue: https://stream.paulneilmusic.com/thisispaulneil Email: contact@paulneilmusic.com Social Media: @paulneilmusic YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@PaulNeilMusic 🔦 Tune in for your weekly dose of Criminal-ish! 🕵🏾‍♀️

episodes.title: Yogaville, Part 2: The Continuation of Yogaville | Criminalish Podcast
episodes.description:
In the second part of our Yogaville series, we dive deep into how Yogaville and Integral Yoga continued to operate after Swami Satchidinanda’s death, including their media presence, the contemporary Yogaville experience, and how they dealt with criticisms of their organization.

Trigger warning: sexual assault
Timestamps for discussions of sexual assault: (I missed the first one I think), 49:08-,60:06-64:56

Part 1 - https://youtu.be/dLfILm37sOI?si=oUhfpksHycPRPRgN

episodes.title: Yogaville, Part 1: The Rise of Swami Satchidananda | Criminalish Podcast
episodes.description:
Welcome back to Season 3 of the Criminalish Podcast! We are going to kick off this season with a 3-part series on Yogaville, a yoga-centric organization headquarter in Virginia that many (including us) have compared to a cult. In this episode, we cover the background and rise of their guru, Swami Satchidananda, and the early criticisms of the organization that is still operating today.
